page.title: 15NEWSPAPER EDITOR (cont)
page.content: Competitions such as bingo are used by the Journal to maintain reader interest during times of reduced circulation due to competition or price increase. The{qualities of a good reporter {include,}asking questions, listening, a good command of English and impartiality. 'News' for the paper comes from reporters, public meetings, the general public and the police, fire and ambulance services. {The issues that concern the people {of Little Hulton,}essentially a large council housing estate, are increased council rents, poor housing maintenance and increased petty crime like mugging and thefts. Despite an uncertain future the Journal claims to be the best detailed historical record of the people and events in this area.
